channel.title: +अधिश्रौतम् on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +अधिश्रौतम् on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Muller on Paribhāṣās
item.description: As Professor Oldenberg was unable to find any other texts connected with the Gṛhya-sūtras, I have tried to bring this volume to its proper size by adding a translation of Āpastamba’s Yajña-Paribhāṣā-sūtras. These Sūtras give some general information about the performance of sacrifices, and may prove useful to the students both of the Śrauta and the Gṛhya sacrifices. Paribhāṣā is defined as a general rule or definition applicable throughout a whole system, and more binding than any particular rule.
